name: LittleMonsters (INTEGR8, Chwisty)
description:
You are a world-class detective in a world of small cute creatures that either live in the wild or are adopted as pets. But slowly, you hear cases of deformed and hideous abominations near the abandoned lab. You grab your hat, pipe, and gun as you head off to investigate.

You approach the lab and the little monsters run towards you. Defeat them and stop this madness.

(Caution: Lowering volume is advised)

Credits:

Samuel Zhang: Programmer & Gameplay Designer

Brian Liu: Lead Programmer & Assets

Christy Yuen: Art & Narrative
